name: Clock Out (bobbyhead333, RISKEYDERPPY, Curran-H)
description:
OVERVIEW

You are a lab rat, a parasite with the ability to take over other organisms, levitate objects, and rewind objects in time. Use your mutated brain to escape from the facility that holds you captive.

CONTROLS

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Hold Shift - Sprint
  • Left click - Pick up/drop
  • Right click - Select object for rewinding
  • Hold G - Rewind selected object in time
  • F - Infest enemy
